import React from 'react' import { Product } from '../../DB/db'; interface Props { allProducts?: any ; } export default function TablesRow({allProducts}: Props) { const TABLE_HEAD = ["Image", "Title", "Description", "Price", ""]; return (
{TABLE_HEAD.map((head) => ( ))} {allProducts?.map(({ image, name, description, price}:Product, index:number) => ( {/* index % 2 === 0 ? "bg-gray-400" : */} ))}
{head}

{name}

{description}

{price}
) }
